thought: To craft stripped_birch_wood, I need to place 4 stripped_birch_log in a 2x2 square in the crafting table. Therefore, I will first move a stripped_birch_log from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1
